analyzed: atha aparam yam caritam mama idam
na ca api me appiyatam avedu
yaḥ tam adasī sacarāḥ udid ca
tasmin ca me appiya tāya ajja

original: Pitari ca te natthi koci viseso;
analyzed: pitari ca te natthi koci viseso
pitaro ca me āsum pitāmahā ca
mā aham kule antima gandhanaḥ ahu
yam tānayim ñāti kulā su gatte
na ca api me appiyatam avedi

original: Atha kena vaṇṇena mayā te bhoti,
analyzed: atha kena vaṇṇena mayā te bhoti
mā aham kule antima gandhinī ahu
putta pemā na idha paratthi kiñci
